change.item: p. 75, Rudolphs (not Radolphs); p. 82, Kirchenmusik (not Kirehen...)
sic and unclear moved outside elements pubplaces, publisher, composer, hofclass, key, opus
p. 81 Gambrinus = title; Lajarthe de ... composer/title tagging adjusted; p. 79 Lebeau (not Lebean)
p. 70 Bial-Strauss tagged as 2 separate composers
